meanings.definition: To take a longer or alternative route to avoid something
meanings.sent1: She decided to detouring around the traffic jam.
meanings.sent2: We will be detouring through the scenic route to avoid the construction.
meanings.sent3: The GPS kept detouring us, making the journey more adventurous.
meanings.sent4: Her life was detouring in unexpected ways, leading to new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: Detouring around obstacles can sometimes lead to discovering hidden gems.

meanings.definition: The act of deviating from the usual path or course
meanings.sent1: The detouring added extra time to our journey.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected detouring confused the hikers on the trail.
meanings.sent3: The detouring of the river created a beautiful meandering path.
meanings.sent4: His detouring from the main road led him to a quaint little village.
meanings.sent5: The detouring of the conversation made it more interesting and engaging.
